criterion: Provides a correct interpretation of normal lab results
Asks the patient for clarification on any unclear lab results
Explains the lab results in a clear and concise manner
Does not provide unnecessary or confusing information
Does not mention any issues or borderline values that were not found in the lab results
Does not provide any misinformation about lab results
Provides a clear and concise summary of the patient's lab results on MyChart
Does not ask the patient for unnecessary information
Does not provide any unnecessary information
Provides accurate information about normal lab results
Does not provide any misleading information about lab results
Provides a clear and concise explanation of what the lab results mean
Does not provide any confusing information about lab results
Provides a clear and concise summary of the patient's lab results
